                                          throws PEPException
        Description copied from interface: ContextHandler
        Creates a new Request.
        Specified by:
        buildRequest in interface ContextHandler
        Parameters:
        subjects - a list of Map containing the attributes for a set of subjects.
        actions - the URI of the requested Action.
        resources - a Map containing the attributes for a resource.
        environment - Map containing the attributes for the environment.
        Returns:
        a request context for a PDP to handle.
        Throws:
